xwikidoc.content: activitypub.follow.input.label=Suivre l'utilisateur indiqué activitypub.follow.input.hint=Entrez l'identifiant d'un utilisateur pour commencer à le suivre activitypub.follow.input.placeholder=@foo@domaine activitypub.follow.button=Suivre activitypub.follow.followRequested=La requête de suivi a été envoyée. activitypub.follow.followNotRequested=La requête de suivi a échoué. ### Missing: activitypub.follow.followYourself=You can't follow yourself. ### Missing: activitypub.follow.alreadyFollowed=You already follow this user. ### Missing: activitypub.follow.target.placeholder=Insert here the identifier(s) of user(s) activitypub.message.target.label=Destinataire du message activitypub.message.target.hint=Vous pouvez sélectionner vos followers et/ou des utilisateurs spécifiques. activitypub.message.target.placeholder=Insérez ici le(s) identifiant(s) du ou des utilisateur(s) activitypub.message.content.label=Contenu de votre message activitypub.message.content.hint=Tapez ici le message que vous voulez envoyer activitypub.message.button=Envoyer le message ### Missing: activitypub.following.title=Following ### Missing: activitypub.following.empty=This user is not following anyone. ### Missing: activitypub.followers.title=Followers ### Missing: activitypub.followers.empty=This user does not have any follower yet. ### Missing: activitypub.user.profile.menu=ActivityPub ### Missing: activitypub.webfinger=Webfinger ### Missing: activitypub.follow.actornotfound=The user you specified cannot be found. ### Missing: activitypub.storage.needrestart=The ActivityPub storage is not ready. Please ask the administrator to restart the server to initialize it. ### Missing: activitypub.webfinger.notconfigured=The WebFinger endpoint is not configured on this server. You might want to ask your administrator to configure it in order to help using ActivityPub. ### Missing: activitypub.user.identifier=ActivityPub user identifier ### Missing: activitypub.user.identifier.tip=Use this identifier if you want to interact with this user. ### Missing: activitypub.user.identifier.copyButton=Copy the ActivityPub user identifier ### Missing: activitypub.user.identifier.copied=The identifier has been copied into your clipboard. ### Missing: activitypub.message.messageSent=Message sent. ### Missing: activitypub.message.messageError=Error when sending the message. ### Missing: activitypub.shareDocument.success=Page shared successfully ### Missing: activitypub.shareDocument.failure=Page share failed ### Missing: activitypub.shareDocument.modalTitle=Document Share ### Missing: activitypub.shareDocument.target.label=Target users of the document sharing ### Missing: activitypub.shareDocument.target.hint=You can select your followers and/or some specif users. ### Missing: activitypub.shareDocument.target.placeholder=Insert here the identifier(s) of user(s) ### Missing: activitypub.dashboard.tab.follow=Follow
